original_text: The people from Ammon paid taxes to Uzziah. He became very powerful. So everyone as far as the border of Egypt knew that he was a great king.
korean_text: 암몬 사람들이 웃시야에게 조공을 바치매 웃시야가 매우 강성하여 이름이 애굽 변방까지 퍼졌더라

sentences.original_text: The people from Ammon paid taxes to Uzziah
So everyone as far as the border of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이집트 국경에 이르는 모든 사람이

sentences.original_text: knew that he was a great king
